name: qiyaas-daily-puzzle-worker
description: Cloudflare Worker for Qiyaas daily puzzle generation

scripts.test-generate: curl -X POST https://qiyaas-daily-puzzle.$(wrangler whoami | grep 'Account Name' | awk '{print $NF}').workers.dev/generate
scripts.test-puzzle: curl https://qiyaas-daily-puzzle.$(wrangler whoami | grep 'Account Name' | awk '{print $NF}').workers.dev/puzzle
scripts.kv:list: wrangler kv:key list --namespace-id=$(grep 'id = ' wrangler.toml | head -1 | cut -d'"' -f2)
scripts.kv:get-puzzle: wrangler kv:key get --namespace-id=$(grep 'id = ' wrangler.toml | head -1 | cut -d'"' -f2) current_puzzle
scripts.kv:get-used: wrangler kv:key get --namespace-id=$(grep 'id = ' wrangler.toml | head -1 | cut -d'"' -f2) used_words
